onyomiExamples.meaning: cool summer, cold summer, cooler-than-normal summer

kunyomiExamples.meaning: cold (to the touch), chilly, icy, freezing, (emotionally) cold, coldhearted, unfeeling, indifferent, unfriendly, distant

kunyomiExamples.reading: つめたいあんこくぶっしつ
